News.Title: EMA Partners: Successful IPO Debut with 26% Premium on NSE SME Platform
News.Summary: EMA Partners shares listed at Rs 156.50, a 26.2% premium over its IPO price of Rs 124 on the NSE SME platform. The IPO was oversubscribed 221 times, raising Rs 66 crore in fresh equity. Funds will be used for working capital, IT investments, and general corporate purposes.
